welcomeDesc: Check out interesting statistics and detailed data from the world of the NBA!

form.title: Title
form.exampleTitle: Does the app provide data about...

hero.statsDesc: Check out the deep specific stats

name: Name

slides.lebron: LeBron James scored the most points in NBA history
slides.billRussel: Bill Russell won over 14% of all NBA Finals in history. He was both a coach and a player
slides.mostFinals: The Los Angeles Lakers and Boston Celtics have won the most NBA championships
slides.mostPointsPerGame: The all time leader in average points per game is Michael Jordan
slides.mostPointsScored: Wilt Chamberlain holds the absurd record for most points scored. He was the only one to score 100 points in one game
slides.tallest: Manute Bol is the tallest player in NBA history measuring 231 cm, while the shortest player in history is Muggsy Bogues measuring 160 cm
slides.lastNames: Williams is the most popular last name in the NBA
slides.siblings: There are 12 siblings in the NBA, the Antetokounmpo brothers, all of whom have won championships
